Class ControllerApc40old

java.lang.Object
  floatingpoint.livemetadecks.Controller
      unused.ControllerApc40old
All Implemented Interfaces:
IModel, IReceiver, ITransmitter
public class ControllerApc40old
extends Controller

This controller is essentially a virtual APC40. It receives and transmits midi messages.

Author:
floatingpoint
